title: WTB: Finishing my T206 Indiana Collection, commons
author: jalex

posts.post_title: WTB: Finishing my T206 Indiana Collection, commons
posts.post_content:
Hello,

Knocked a couple off my list this week. Updated for your consideration... I have 1 to go.

They are:

Doc Crandall (Portrait, no cap)

Would like an odd back or two just to diversify my ad backs. Could use a Polar Bear and a Sovereign and wouldn't mind adding another Old Mill to my collection, but all backs will be considered. Like SGC, but raw or PSA is fine if they are the right card. Just looking for nice centering, minimal creasing and minimal paper loss, pretty cards, but not perfect. A stamp or mark on the back doesn't bother me. In grading terms, something that would fall in the SGC 40-60 range, but marks are ok.

PM me if you got em

Cheers,

Jim
Just a bump, still looking for the right Crandall...
